snippet: “The United States of America not only recognizes our role in creating this problem, we embrace our responsibility to do something about it,” President Obama said at the gathering.
abstract: World leaders gather in Paris for United Nations session on climate change that many describe as pivotal for planet's future; encouraging agreement on severity of problem is balanced with developing countries' concerns they are being penalized for situation others created; governments and private industry in developed countries pledge to help develop clean energy sources.

byline.original: By CORAL DAVENPORT and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: “The United States of America not only recognizes our role in creating this problem, we embrace our responsibility to do something about it,” President Obama said at the gathering.

headline.main: Citing Urgency, World Leaders Converge on France for Climate Talks
headline.print_headline: Citing Urgency, World Leaders Converge on France for Climate Meeting

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
